idea:
We , HIND DEFENCE EQUIPMENT PVT LTD (Parent Company with common Director of- HIND OFFSHORE PVT LTD), are pleased to introduce ourselves as an industrial house in India having diverse business interests.
Our Company has been established with sole aim of providing perimeter security & surveillance solutions to Armed & Paramilitary Forces & have solutions to suit long range, mid-range & short range options available to address the varied growing threats on land, marine or aerial in nature.
name: HIND DEFENCE EQUIPMENT PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We help organisations creatively. Geodesy is a design company with multidisciplinary approach. And would like to introduce ourselves more in detail to you. We design brands & total retail experience. We are a team of design experts working together across Design, Digital & Project Management Consultancy. We are abide to add a unique value to your business from conception to execution.
 
We design things, strategies, solve problems, innovate, develop systems. We possesses good understanding of diverse design environments and are well versed in global trends. We have consulted leading brands on brand strategy, environment design, store architecture, design & project management. We holds rich working experience of collaborating with large multi-cultural teams across developed & developing markets.

We are valued for our ability to translate global trends to local markets. I strongly believe that our experience will align well with your requirement for a design consultancy and would make a valuable addition to your company.
name: GEODESY DESIGN COLLABORATIVE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are a consumer finance focused Fintech which offers loans to under-served segment of the society. Most of our customers are either new to credit or do not have credit history. Hence, they are largely not catered by Banks and large NBFCs. By use of alternate data points, proprietary credit algorithms and completely digital customer onboarding and fulfilment process we are providing simple and transparent loans to such customers. Most of our customers are female micro-entrepreneurs who are directly running business from home or shops with average household income of less than Rs. 20-25k per month. We not only provide finance for sustainability of business but also direct employment of associates who are employed by these micro-entrepreneurs. We also provide loans to graduates for directly enrolling into Skill development programs which are meant for future employment.
name: MITRON CAPITAL PRIVATE LIMITED
